name: Ducky videogames party
description:
Ducky videogames party is a collection of 100 different microgames! The Duckies must go through them all to defeat the evil spirit of the cartridge, SCP-3000. And the villain won't let them some rest, because each game lasts less than 30 seconds! Cowboy duel, sorting tomatoes, barrel ride, sea battles, jungle adventures, everyday life of a crazy scientist and more! There will be lots of fun and variety, get in the game! Release on Steam in late 2022 (I hope)


STORY  

A group of ducklings find a mysterious "100-in-1" cartridge for Quacktendo. Of course, they are runing home to one of them to find out what are these games are on the cartridge-who would do otherwise! However, the cartridge turned out to be a trap by an evil spirit calling himself SCP-3000! Now the duck friends will have to show all their gaming skills, otherwise the villain will get their souls and make them characters for his games. Being two-dimensional and pixel, constantly dying and reborn - an unenviable fate, I say! Without your help, the ducklings won't be able to cope. Will you help them? Bring your friends too, you can playing games by rotation or compete in other modes!

FEATURES

  • Warm atmosphere of childhood of the 1990s years (time of action - 06/03/1993):

Even though those fateful games take place, the location is not the worst - SCP-3000 locked the ducklings in the room of the house of a typical duckling of that time. The screensaver, the room, the menu and dialogues are drawn and animated with love* and attention to details. Imagine that you have gathered with friends in front of a pot-bellied TV screen. Cartridge with a bunch of unknown games inserted into the console! A small cozy room, the rays of the setting sun break through the window. You have already walked a lot and are ready to push the buttons of the gamepad properly! Summer, a lot of free time, new video games, no worries, hakuna-matata and all of that! Maybe Mom will bring some juice and cookies. Or... kick out friends home?! This is not so important, because tomorrow they will come again.

  •  Variety:

The game has 14 sets of 5-10 games each, as well as a separate category for boss games (these can be played in story mode and in the game vault). Moreover, there are 3 levels of difficulty for each game! Different styles of pixel graphics, lots of unique tunes and sounds. And even the losing can be interesting, because you never know what's going to happen! And finally - interchangeable panels! As you go through the story mode, play through the games and fulfill special conditions, you can unlock all 16 decorative panels - arcade, greek, comics, summer, brick and more.

  • Game Modes:

In story mode, the ducklings, with your help, will EXACTLY get through all 100 games and defeat SCP. 5 Ducklings - 5 main chapters. Opened games appears in the vault, where you can choose any of them, practice and pass on all difficulties. Finally, there is a survival mode - try to achieve the highest score! However... No one bothers you up to one’s ears into the unknown with friends, immediately turning on one of the companion modes! Just make sure you don't get tickled or slapped. Although... why not?!

"Quack-quack, waiting only for you!" - Serg, Grisha, Alex, Denis and Alexandra. 

P.S: roster of games in the demo version will change in future!
